mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.job_number AS "jobNumber", a.job_name AS "jobName", a.education AS "education", a.work_year AS "workYear", a.nation AS "nation", a.doctor_duty AS "doctorDuty", a.sts AS "sts", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.introduce AS "introduce", u2.name AS "user.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = a.user_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM h_doctor a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO h_doctor( id, user_id, job_number, job_name, education, work_year, nation, doctor_duty, sts, update_date, remarks, introduce ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{user.id}, #{jobNumber}, #{jobName}, #{education}, #{workYear}, #{nation}, #{doctorDuty}, #{sts}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{introduce} )
mapper.update: UPDATE h_doctor SET user_id = #{user.id}, job_number = #{jobNumber}, job_name = #{jobName}, education = #{education}, work_year = #{workYear}, nation = #{nation}, doctor_duty = #{doctorDuty}, sts = #{sts}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, introduce = #{introduce} WHERE id = #{id}
